title: Build a Simple Transaction Manager
description: Apply everything you learned about dictionaries and sets to build a simple transaction manager for your personal finance tracker. This mini-project combines dictionary operations, sets, and functions.
instructions:
1. Create an empty `transactions` dictionary to store transactions by ID
2. Implement `add_transaction(transactions, id, category, amount, tags)` that adds a transaction with the given details. Tags should be stored as a set.
3. Implement `get_transaction(transactions, id)` that safely returns a transaction or None
4. Implement `get_all_tags(transactions)` that returns all unique tags across all transactions
5. Add at least 3 sample transactions and test your functions
6. Print a summary showing all transactions and unique tags
